Title: Requires certain grants to nonpublic schools for health and safety purposes be able to be used on school resource officers
Summary: Requires certain grants to nonpublic schools for services and expenses of health and safety equipment, security personnel, related assessments and training needs, remediation of hazardous conditions, and/or the repair and maintenance of buildings, facilities, appurtenances, equipment and systems to maintain the health and safety of school building occupants be able to be used on school resource officers.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the education law, in relation to requiring certain grants to nonpublic schools for health and safety purposes be able to be used on school resource officers
